USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND
FAV_NAME LIKE '%'||#{FAV_NAME}||'%' AND

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TN_USER_FAV (USER_ID, GROUP_NAME, FAV_ID, FAV_NAME, FAV_CONTENT, FAV_G2DATA, FAV_IMG, FAV_EXTENT) VALUES (#{USER_ID}, #{GROUP_NAME},(SELECT NVL(MAX(FAV_ID),0)+1 FROM TN_USER_FAV WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND GROUP_NAME = #{GROUP_NAME}),#{FAV_NAME}, #{FAV_CONTENT}, #{FAV_G2DATA}, #{FAV_IMG}, 0)
